name: CryptoMate
0:
”Alexa, ask crypto mate how much is bitcoin”
”Alexa, ask crypto mate price of bitcoin”
”Alexa, ask crypto mate bitcoin”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crypto mate
des:
CryptoMate provides you with the current price of over 400+ crypto currencies, including popular currencies such as bitcoin, ethereum, dash, litecoin, ripple, monero, zcash, antshares, stratis, waves and many more.

Future updates will provide information about market cap, percentage change and much more.

Full list of supported currencies can be found on: https://github.com/anton4o/cryptomate
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
